metadata.title: CVE-2024-4539 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versionsstarting from 15.4 prior to 16.9.7, starting from 16.10 prior to 16.10.5,and starting from 16.11 prior to 16.11.2 where abusing the API to filterbranch and tags could lead to Denial of Service.

criterions.comment: gitlab package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
